spreadResult.title: 3-Card Reading

UUU.love: Today is a day of connection. Express yourself honestly—the other person will likely respond positively. It's a great time for confessions or meaningful conversations.
UUU.money: Money flows smoothly today. Financial decisions you make now have a good chance of working out. Trust your judgment and move forward with confidence.
UUU.work: Things are lining up well at work. Whatever you tackle today has a high chance of success, so it's a great time to handle important tasks you've been putting off.

UUR.love: Your heart is in the right place, but actions might not land well. Avoid big confessions or commitments—just show small gestures of care today.
UUR.money: Your plan is solid, but execution might slip. Avoid major expenses and stick to handling small amounts today.
UUR.work: Progress is fine, but you might fumble at the finish line. Hold off on big decisions and focus on organizing and tidying up tasks.

URU.love: It's easy to misread the other person's intentions today. Don't jump to conclusions—try asking 'Is that what you really mean?' to clarify.
URU.money: There may be hidden variables at play. Before making investments or big decisions, ask yourself: 'What might I be missing?'
URU.work: There's a hidden factor in the workflow. Before moving forward, ask: 'Is there anything else that could affect this?'

RUU.love: Your emotions are tangled, making it hard to start clean. Before reaching out, take a moment to sort through your own feelings first.
RUU.money: Your mind is scattered, clouding your judgment. Before any financial decisions, take a breather and organize your thoughts.
RUU.work: You're not at your best, so getting started might be slow. Spend 5 minutes tidying your desk or reviewing your to-do list before diving in.

URR.love: Defensive energy is strong today. Avoid big romantic moves and just send a simple 'thinking of you' message instead.
URR.money: Stay away from situations that trigger spending. Stick to small management tasks like reviewing your budget today.
URR.work: Focus on wrapping up existing work rather than starting something new. Postpone meetings or presentations if you can.

RUR.love: There's inner conflict and your approach might be off today. Just spend 10 minutes looking at photos and remembering good times together.
RUR.money: Both your emotions and financial judgment are cloudy. Spend just 10 minutes checking this week's expenses in your budgeting app.
RUR.work: Inner conflict meets confused approach. Take 10 minutes to jot down just 3 things you need to do today.

RRU.love: The situation is murky, but the advice card shows the way. Trust its direction and take one small action based on its message.
RRU.money: Money matters are unclear, but focus on the advice card's message. One small step in that direction is enough for today.
RRU.work: Work feels complicated, but the advice card is your anchor. Just execute one thing it suggests today.

RRR.love: Today is about taking care of yourself, not romance. Instead of reaching out, maybe give yourself some alone time?
RRR.money: Your energy is too low for financial decisions. Maybe just rest today and think about it tomorrow?
RRR.work: Focusing on work is tough today. Don't push yourself—maybe just do some light organizing or take notes?

reversed.title: Stop and check
reversed.body: Execution is unstable today. The card above says to pause and review. Verification comes before progress.

upright.title: A hint for finding hidden factors
upright.body: When looking for hidden variables, the card above points the way. Use this perspective to spot what you might have missed.

reversed.title: Hold off on decisions

reversed.title: Take a break today
reversed.body: Your start is unsteady. The card above says don't push too hard. Rest and recharge your energy today.

upright.title: Focus on just this
upright.body: Defensive energy is high today. The card above says focus only on essentials. Do just this one thing and save the rest for tomorrow.

reversed.title: Just observe today
reversed.body: Defensive energy is strong today. The card above says don't make moves. Just watch and wait for now.

upright.title: Just one small action
upright.body: Inner friction is present today. The card above says start small. Just do one tiny thing.

reversed.title: Sort your feelings first
reversed.body: Inner friction is present today. The card above says to tend to your heart first. Emotional clarity comes before action.

upright.title: Focus on the advice
upright.body: The situation is unclear, but the card above strengthens the advice. Take one step forward guided by the advice card and this insight.

reversed.title: Reconsider the advice too
reversed.body: Things are complicated today. The card above calls for extra caution. Think twice about the advice and move slowly.

upright.title: Direction for your reset
upright.body: Today calls for an inner reset. The card above shows the path to recovery. Let this energy replenish your spirit.

reversed.title: Complete rest is needed
reversed.body: Today calls for an inner reset. The card above recommends full rest. It's okay to do absolutely nothing today.
